page.title: 17Law & Order_Mayfield(cont.)
page.content: The office has no cell either so arrested people have to be taken direct to Crowborough.As elsewhere Crime is increasing & the most frequent crime in Mayfield is day_time burglary.There is also a small but growing drug problem & driving & traffic offences are also common. Mayfield was chosen as one off the pilot 'Crime Watch' villages in Sussex,& this is still in operation. There are three 'co_ordinators' in Mayfield,well_known & knowledgable people whom the villagers are encouraged to contact in non_emergencies & advice.These co_ordinators then contact the Police who deal with the problems/enquiries as soon as possible.Crime Watch was designed to encourage the Public to assist the Police & so far has worked well.
